### Abstract

This event serves as a meaningful forum to promote the role and empowerment of women in the fields of STEAM (Science, Technology, Engineering, Arts, and Mathematics) in connection with sustainable development. Here, experts and speakers will engage in discussions and share initiatives and practical experiences in overcoming gender barriers, enhancing access, and creating career development opportunities for women in STEAM. The event also aims to be a powerful source of inspiration for young women, encouraging them to confidently pursue their passions, achieve their dreams, and drive positive change in their communities.
